jump_scares.spoiler: Eric pretends to be pulled into the water to scare Cash as a joke
After hearing a splashing noise, Eric and Cash turn around to see something in the water leaping straight at them
The crocodile suddenly drags the floating dead body underwater
Something touches Cash under the water, startling him
Yolanda hears a splash and turns around in fright, shining the light on the dead body
While looking around for the crocodile, it suddenly appears right next to Cash and bites him
The crocodile suddenly jumps out of the water onto the rock
As Viktor looks around the water with a flashlight, the crocodile suddenly jumps out and attacks him
The crocodile jumps out of the water towards the car
